description: Centered icosahedral (or cuboctahedral) numbers, also crystal ball sequence for f.c.c. lattice.
comments: Called "magic numbers" in some chemical contexts.Partial sums of A005901(n). - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Oct 30 2003Equals binomial transform of [1, 12, 30, 20, 0, 0, 0,...]. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 01 2008Crystal ball sequence for A_3 lattice. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 03 2012

N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
